com.cyc.session

Class CycSessionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyc.session.CycSessionManager

  • public class CycSessionManager
extends Object
    The CycSessionManager provides singleton access to a SessionManager instance. Additionally, it provides several convenience methods to access it.

    The CycSessionManager searches for SessionManager services during class initialization. If it cannot find any, it will throw a CycSessionManager.CycSessionManagerInitializationError.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CycSessionManager.CycSessionManagerInitializationError
      Exception thrown if the CycSessionManager cannot find any SessionManager services during class initialization.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CycSession getCurrentSession()
      Returns the CycSession currently assigned to this thread.
      static SessionManager getInstance()
      Returns the current instance of SessionManager.
      static void reloadInstance()
      Loads a new SessionManager.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static SessionManager getInstance()
        Returns the current instance of SessionManager.
        Returns:
        The current SessionManager instance

      • reloadInstance

        public static void reloadInstance()
                           throws SessionServiceException,
                                  SessionConfigurationException
        Loads a new SessionManager. The previous SessionManager will be closed if it has not been closed already.
        Throws:
        SessionServiceException
        SessionConfigurationException

      • getCurrentSession

        public static CycSession getCurrentSession()
                                    throws SessionConfigurationException,
                                           SessionCommunicationException,
                                           SessionInitializationException
        Returns the CycSession currently assigned to this thread. If no CycSession object currently exists, one will be acquired via #getSession() and assigned to the local thread.

        Note that this is a convenience method which simply trampolines to CycSessionManager#getInstance()#getCurrentSession() .

        Returns:
        CycSession
        Throws:
        SessionConfigurationException - if the application is not sufficiently configured for the CycConfigurationManager to connect to a Cyc server.
        SessionCommunicationException - if the application encounters problems communicating with a Cyc server.
        SessionInitializationException - if the application encounters problems initializing the CycSession.
